posts.author: dmcgrynch
posts.content: Hey guys i need some help to build a lvl 40 druid/shifter with focus on the Rakshasa form. Can you please help me mailing this build?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi there, dmcgrynch, and welcome to the Guild! Unfortunately, druids and shifters are about as far from my areas of knowledge (such as they are) as is possible to get, but I didn't want you to feel ignored!

Maybe it would help in pulling others' attention if you could re-post this in the Build Request sub-forum - 'cos that's what this is, after all. Oh, and do please have a look at the guidelines for requests.

Cheers!

Oh, and just a quick question from me - as unknowledgeable as I am - why Rakshasa? I've had a look at some of the other Druid/Shifter builds here, and they seem to focus on Risen Lord or Dragon, so I'm just interested.

Thanks

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
The Rakshasa Build can be really powerful, actually.

I mucked around with it a couple times, I'm gonna post 2 versions,both powerful. It will all be revealed.

All I need is time.

Welcome to the guild. It can be really funny.

Cheers, both.

Sent fra min SM-G920F via Tapatalk

posts.author: dmcgrynch
posts.content: Hey man, thanks andi  will post it on the buils request. For your question, Rakshasa have infinite uses of IceStorm, if you pick the the empowered spell feat and select it as a druid in your skill list when you shapechange to Rakshasa you will have infinite empowered icestorm. But except for the fact that i know this combo i don't have sufficient knowledge to build this well so thats why i requested and build to follow...
